fr.inria.atlanmod.neoemf.data.mapping

Interface ValueMapper

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AllReferenceAs<M>, Backend, BerkeleyDbBackend, BlueprintsBackend, DataMapper, HBaseBackend, InMemoryBackend, ManyReferenceAs<M>, ManyReferenceMergedAs<M>, ManyValueMapper, ManyValueWithArrays, ManyValueWithIndices, ManyValueWithLists, MapDbBackend, MongoDbBackend, ReferenceAs<M>, Store
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBackend, AbstractCachingStore, AbstractDataMapper, AbstractDataMapperChain, AbstractInMemoryBackend, AbstractStore, AutoSavingStore, BoundInMemoryBackend, ClassCachingStore, ClosedStore, ContainerCachingStore, DefaultInMemoryBackend, FeatureCachingStore, InvalidBackend, InvalidDataMapper, ListeningStore, NoopStore, ReadOnlyStore, SizeCachingStore

    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public interface ValueMapper
    An object capable of mapping single-valued attributes represented as a set of key/value pair.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void removeValue(SingleFeatureBean feature)
      Removes the value of the specified feature.
      <V> Optional<V> valueFor(SingleFeatureBean feature, V value)
      Defines the value of the specified feature.
      <V> Optional<V> valueOf(SingleFeatureBean feature)
      Retrieves the value of the specified feature.

    • Method Detail

      • valueOf

        @Nonnull
<V> Optional<V> valueOf(SingleFeatureBean feature)
        Retrieves the value of the specified feature.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of value
        Parameters:
        feature - the bean identifying the value
        Returns:
        an Optional containing the value, or Optional.empty() if the feature hasn't any value or doesn't exist
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any parameter is null

      • valueFor

        @Nonnull
<V> Optional<V> valueFor(SingleFeatureBean feature,
                                   V value)
        Defines the value of the specified feature.
        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of value
        Parameters:
        feature - the bean identifying the value
        value - the value to set
        Returns:
        an Optional containing the previous value of the feature, or Optional.empty() if the feature has no value before
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any parameter is null

      • removeValue

        void removeValue(SingleFeatureBean feature)
        Removes the value of the specified feature.
        Parameters:
        feature - the bean identifying the value
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if any parameter is null
